message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that's worth at least $1000000 to me, and I believe it has the potential to be even more valuable to the right buyer. I'm confident you'll see the incredible value it holds. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the significant value I place on it, but it also offers you a substantial potential return on investment. Let me know your thoughts.
